div.p: Your letter of the 13th has just come to hand. Why did you not get some of the money I left in bank I would have written to you to do so if I had thought a moment that you would not do it. I will be with you next week I am almost positive but still you had better get some of the bonds and Mr Stephens will cash them for you I have not recd my pay yet since I came down or I would have sent it on to you see if you can get a house if not we will have to try some other place every village South is crowded and lawyers abound Judge Banity telegrahps that he will be here on Saturday morning and I hope to get off in the evening boat, love to all
